environment

Class MicroAgentBody

  • java.lang.Object
    • environment.WorldObject
      • environment.WorldObjectTexture
        • microagent.AbstractMicroAgentBody
          • environment.MicroAgentBody
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Perceivable

    public class MicroAgentBody
extends AbstractMicroAgentBody
    This AgentBody is an implementation of the abstract class AbstractAgentBody used in every current scenario of SmartGov. As an agent, this class contains sensors and actions.
    Author:
    Simon Pageaud
